CAutoLock
CAutoLock

Provides smart object management of critical sections

Header

Base/Core/CritSec.h

Functions
CAutoLock
CAutoLock(
CCritSec *pLock
)

Locks the specified critical section on stack entrance

Parameters
pLock
CCritSec*

critical section to lock

CAutoLock
~CAutoLock()

Unlocks the specified critical section on stack exit
